title: A Reason to Fight
description: He believes the sun will rise again, but all she sees is the storm.Ryder Sanderson is the carefree, surf-loving chef of the Firefly Inn—or so he would have everyone believe. He thrives on handling the happiness of others, hiding his pain behind a witty mask.That is until a beautiful stranger comes to the Firefly, and he realizes maybe his mom was right…there can be light after the storm.June Parsons is on the run. A woman burdened by unimaginable pain, somehow able to keep a light in her eyes. She finds refuge and understanding in those she meets at the Firefly Inn, and when she confides in Ryder, she discovers comfort and tenderness she never expected. But when her monster is lurking in the shadows, will June’s nightmare become reality? Or can she and Ryder finally find the happiness they deserve together?A REASON TO FIGHT is a novel about finding hope, joy, and love. It is the third book in Iannah Roberts’s Firefly Series and must be read after reading Piece by Piece. Warning: These characters’ lives have been shaped by death and domestic violence. This novel contains scenes dealing with loss and interpersonal violence that may be a trigger for some.
author: Iannah Roberts
